original_title: Pedigree Dogs Exposed: Three Years On
overview: Pedigree Dogs Exposed: Three Years On is a 2012 follow-up to the 2008 BBC One documentary, Pedigree Dogs Exposed. While this second programme looks at the positive changes made since the original film, it focuses on investigating areas of continuing concern.
tagline: The Powerful Sequel to the Most Influential Documentary Ever Made About Dogs
title: Pedigree Dogs Exposed: Three Years On
